content: pdf digital download crochet pattern easy beginner friendly crochet market bag includes a full video tutorial on our youtube channel for size large pattern includes 2 sizes our dishie-lous market bag is the perfect reusable and eco friendly bag great for shopping the beach or a project bag youtube video https //youtu be/3h4svjynneq large size pattern free on the blog https //www mjsoffthehookdesigns com/dishie-lous-market-bag/ yarn requirements dishie & dishie twist from wecrochet- shown in conch begonia and kenai 100% cotton 190yds/100g balls s l twist mc 2 2 yards 265 360 solid cc 1 1 yards 50 70 total yards 315 430 crochet hook requirements us h/8 5mm us i/9 5 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge additional supplies yarn needle removable stitch marker garment tag optional gauge 13 sts and 8 row equal to 4 in pattern with 5 5mm hook the pattern is written in standard american terms you re welcome to sell your finished items from this pattern when selling items online please reference me as the designer all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
